statements: SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, is_admin FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE is_admin = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE is_admin = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1 OR user_id = 2 OR user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND is_admin = FALSE ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id > 10 AND password IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE is_admin = TRUE AND password = 'securepassword';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_name = 'READ';
SELECT permission_id, permission_name, permission_desc FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT username, permission_name FROM users JOIN permissions ON users.user_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT user_id, username, permission_name FROM users LEFT JOIN permissions ON users.user_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT robot_name, serial_number FROM robots ORDER BY robot_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE robot_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM access_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT robot_name, serial_number FROM robots WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY robot_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE access_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT u.username, r.robot_name, a.access_time FROM users u JOIN robots r ON u.user_id = r.user_id JOIN access_logs a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE u.role = 'admin' ORDER BY a.access_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT permission_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id JOIN permissions p ON p.permission_id = 1;
SELECT u.username AS User, r.role_name AS Role FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE u.user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT role_id, permission_id FROM role_permissions WHERE permission_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users INNER JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id INNER JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%admin%';

SELECT permission_name, role_name FROM permissions INNER JOIN role_permissions ON permissions.permission_id = role_permissions.permission_id INNER JOIN roles ON role_permissions.role_id = roles.role_id;
